Articles.Content: Kerbie Kerman! For some reason it sounds epic
Corban Kerman. It's fun to say

Here is a few...

1. Thomsen Kerman

2. Neilmore Kerman

3. Thompbury Kerman

My fav is neilmore the other 2 are cool too, but i only ever got neilmore once... :( the others i got at least twice.
I'm just sad I never got a chance to see Dildo Kerman in my own save before they added a "bad name filter" to the generator.
Seekin by name Seekin by nature
Kirrim Kerman

I currently have a certain "Richgas Kerman" sitting in the crew quarters.

I'm thinking of sending him to Moho... To explore, er, you know... Holes.
German Kerman. Not joking.

I just got several interesting names with my 0.21.1 install;

Munvan Kerbin

Sonkin Kerbin
Billy-Bobmund Kerman.
In my main .20 save, I have a Luke Sky-I mean Kerman, a Thomgun, and a Donton Kerman.

In my main .20 save, I have a Luke Sky-I mean Kerman, a Thomgun, and a Donton Kerman.

omg you have Thompgun too? nice XD

Although I'm a bit sad that it's a randomly generated name, since I'm seeing "Thomp-" as a prefix of sorts in a lot of names in this thread; now I believe it's not a reference put in the game, as far as I can tell.

Oh well, still gonna pull a Top Gun moment and have Thompgun buzz the tower!

I got Thomtop Kerman, which just sounds really funny to me for some reason.

Also Annie Kerman, which seems to prove that there are indeed female kerbals in the game. If only there were more than just Annie and whoever else I haven't found yet...
Lars Kerman
So do you think Squad implemented some kind of random name generator for this? That German Kerman sounds just like a randomly added -man suffix.

I got Thomtop Kerman, which just sounds really funny to me for some reason.

Also Annie Kerman, which seems to prove that there are indeed female kerbals in the game. If only there were more than just Annie and whoever else I haven't found yet...

Jennie Kerman, back in .19.

We called her the daughter of Jeb, because she spawned with BadS ON by default, something I have never seen since.

She passed away when my Kerbin mobile base was shredded by an unfortunate escaped decoupler bomb.

[closed]

Dude, you've got Loton and Ronson Kerman in one save with German! Gah! I never get any cool names *goes to sulk in the corner*.
Ladies and Gentlemen of Kerbin, I'd like to introduce the solo pilot of my first space station: Loner Kerman.

Frank Kerman
